Verses: 2 manupuththirane, Nee Un Mugaththai Seyeermalaikku Neraagath Thiruppi Adharku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu,

3 adharku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar, Seyeermalaiye, Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, En Kaiyai Unakku Virodhamaaganeetti, Unnaip Paazhum Avaandharaveliyumaakkuven.
4 un Pattanangalai, Vanaandharamaakkippoduven; Nee Paazhaaippovaai; Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaai.

5 nee Pazhaiya Pagaiyai Vaiththu Isravel Puththirarudaiya Akkiramam Niraiverugaiyil Avargalukku Undaana Aabaththin Kaalaththile Pattayaththin Koormaiyinaal Avargaludaiya Raththaththai Sindhinapadiyaal,

6 naan Raththap Pazhikku Unnai Oppuvippen; Raththappazhi Unnaip Pinthodarum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavaraayirukkira Naan En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren; Nee Raththaththai Verukkaadhapadiyinaal Raththam Unnaip Pinthodarum.
7 naan Seyeermalaiyaip Paazhum Avaandhara Idamumaakki, Adhile Pokkuvaravu Seyvaar Illaadhapadi Sangaarancheydhu,
8 adhin Malaigalaik Kolaiyundavargalaale Nirappuven; Un Medugalilum Un Pallaththaakkugalilum Un Ellaa Aarugalilum Pattayaththaal Vettundavargal Vizhuvaargal.
9 nee Endraikkum Avaandharaveliyaayirukkumpadi Seyven; Un Pattanangal Kudiyetrappaduvadhillai; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
10 irandu Jaadhigalum Irandudhesangalum Karththar Vasamaayirundhum, Avaigal Ennudaiyavaigalaagum, Naan Avaigalai Sudhandhariththukkolluven Endru Nee Sollugirapadiyinaal,

11 nee Avargalmel Vaiththa Varmaththinaal Seydha Un Kobaththukkuththakkadhaagavum, Un Poraamaikkuthakkadhaagavum Naan Seydhu, Karththaraagiya Aandavaraayirukkira Naan Unnai Nyaayantheerkkumpodhu, Ennai Avargalukkul Adhinaal Ariyappannuven Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren.

12 isravelin Malaigal Paazhaakkappattu Engalukku Iraiyaagak Kodukkappattadhu Endru, Nee Avaigalukku Virodhamaai Sonna Un Nindhanaigalaiyellaam Karththaraagiya Naan Ketten Endru Appozhudhu Arindhukolvaai.
13 neengal Ungal Vaayinaal Enakku Virodhamaagap Perumaipaaraatti, Enakku Virodhamaaga Ungal Vaarththaigalaip Perugappannineergal; Adhai Naan Ketten.
14 boomiyellaam Magizhumpodhu Naan Unnaip Paazhaayirukkumpadi Seyven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

15 isravel Vamsaththaarin Sudhandharam Paazhaaipponadhaik Kandu Magizhndhaaye, Unakkum Appadiye Sambavikkachcheyven; Seyeer Malaiye, Edhome, Nee Muzhudhum Paazhaavaai; Adhinaal Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargalendru Uraiththaar Endru Sollu.
